rows.label: qst000602_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, what's up? Got a bit of a
job for me, have you?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, I see. Twaina needs her stove
sorted out again, does she? Well, I'm
your man!

rows.label: qst000602_msg0003
rows.name:
The cost of the work'll be about
3,000G, I'd say.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0004
rows.name:
I'll need payment up front, though...
I'm a bit of a stickler for that.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0005
rows.name:
It's my wife, see. She goes bananas
when I give people credit.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0006
rows.name:
Honestly, I'm more scared of getting it
in the ear from her than this bloody
Divine Beast falling down!

rows.label: qst000602_msg0007
rows.name:
So, if you don't mind, I need paying
first, for the sake of my sanity.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0008
rows.name:
Although... Maybe there is one way
I could do it for nothing...

rows.label: qst000602_msg0009
rows.name:
There's something I wanted to give to
my wife, you see.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0010
rows.name:
She's pretty fierce, but she does right
by me, she does.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0011
rows.name:
So, I wanted to get her this nifty little
thing called a Chain of Keys. They
don't sell any round here though.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0012
rows.name:
Maybe you salvagers could fish one
up from somewhere. That's the sort
of thing you do, isn't it?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, get me a Chain of Keys, and
I'll call it quits on fixing the stove.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll be happy with the cash, if you can't
find one, though.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0015
rows.name:
Either way, I'm a happy chappy. Let me
know when you've got it sorted!

rows.label: qst000602_msg0101
rows.name: So, did you get it sorted out then?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0102
rows.name: Which will you give?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0103
rows.name: Give the money

rows.label: qst000602_msg0104
rows.name: Give the Chain of Keys

rows.label: qst000602_msg0105
rows.name:
The price is the same as I said before.
3,000G to be exact.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0106
rows.name: Thanks a lot.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0107
rows.name:
The job's over at Twaina's place, you
said?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0108
rows.name:
I'll head over there and get her stove
fixed then. See you later!

rows.label: qst000602_msg0109
rows.name:
Oh, thank you ever so much.
That's a really big help to me.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0110
rows.name:
I'd never have been able to get
something like this with the little bit of
money the wife lets me spend.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0111
rows.name:
I'll head over to Twaina's and get her
stove fixed then.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0112
rows.name: It'll be right as rain in no time!

rows.label: qst000602_msg0113
rows.name: Er, you don't seem to have the goods.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0114
rows.name: It's a Chain of Keys that I'm after.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0115
rows.name: Or 3,000G. That'll do as well.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0116
rows.name:
Either one's fine. Just come back and
let me know when you've got it sorted.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0117
rows.name: Pay 3,000G?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0118
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst000602_msg0119
rows.name: Don't pay
